title: Guard Your Daughters
description: Guard Your Daughters by Diana Tutton is a 1953 novel about a family of five daughters living in the country â€“ or rather four daughters since one has recently escaped by marrying and it is Morgan, Cressida, Teresa and Thisbe who are still at home with their parents.
